title: Special Event: Talk & Walk with Mika Horibuchi
short_description: Guided tour in partnership with the Museum of Contemporary Art
list_description: Guided tour in partnership with the Museum of Contemporary Art
description:
Go on an adventure with artist Mika Horibuchi as she leads an intimate group from the Museum of Contemporary Art (MCA) to the Art Institute of Chicago to see the Dutch masters that inspired her paintings. Horibuchi is joined by exhibition curator José Esparza Chong Cuy from the MCA and Emerson Bowyer, Searle Associate Curator of European Painting and Sculpture at the Art Institute.

This event is a walking program that begins at the MCA and travels a mile and half to the Art Institute with a few scheduled stops. Participants may also rejoin the group at the Art Institute of Chicago if preferred. Registration is required, and tickets include admission to both museums.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.

Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
